intro: Psychotria nigra, commonly known as the black Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of the Americas, particularly found in the Caribbean and parts of Central and South America. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and small, white to pale yellow flowers. It often grows in shaded, moist environments such as forests and along streambanks. The plant has been used traditionally in various cultural and medicinal practices.
